There's a problem with this file.  The colors are constantly shifting across the screen.  Looks like possibly some sort of copy protection that wasn't disabled when the disc was ripped.  The movie is watchable if this was the only copy available, but it isn't.  If not for the color shifts, the overall quality is very good, although it's STANDARD-DEF.  The source may have been a Blu-Ray, but they ripped it to SD resolution.  I deleted the file after I saw color problem.
